original_text: The Lord also said to me, ‘Do not go into a house where they are eating a funeral meal. Do not join with them to weep because someone in the family has died. I have removed my blessing and my faithful love from these people. I will no longer be kind to them. That is what I say.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 초상집에 들어가지 말라 가서 통곡하지 말며 그들을 위하여 애곡하지 말라 내가 이 백성에게서 나의 평강을 빼앗으며 인자와 사랑을 제함이라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord also said to me
Do not go into a house
where they are eating a funeral meal
Do not join with them to weep
because someone in the family has died
and my faithful love from these people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 백성에게서 나의 인자하심을 거두었다

sentences.original_text: I will no longer be kind to them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 더 이상 그들에게 친절하지 않을 것이다
